text: You hail what looks to be a small colony on the surface. Only to be greeted by an pastel equid upon your monitor.
options:
equestrian_celestia_1_opened:Greet the Princess
equestrian_celestia_1_denied:Do not greet the Princess

text: "WHINNY WHINNY WHINNY WHINNY WHINNY NEIGH NEIGH WHINNY WHINNY WHINNY NEIGH NEIGH NEIGH WHINNY."
She continues to speak like a horse.
